title: Scents of summer
text:

Scents of summer at the Okura Spa The Okura Spa at The Okura Prestige Bangkok is offering a new treatment that utilises the many benefits of lavender. BANGKOK Scents of summer The Okura Spa at The Okura Prestige Bangkok is offering a new treatment that utilises the many benefits of lavender. This new Lavender Treatment begins with a foot bath followed by a gentle body scrub and relaxing aroma massage. Each stage of the treatment uses lavender extract products for total relaxation. It costs Bt3,800 and is available through August 31. Book a session at (02) 687 9000 |or e-mail: spa@okurabangkok.com. In honour of Ramadan Ambassador Hotel Bangkok is offering a Welcome Ramadan 2015 package for stays from now through July 17. Rates per night (room only) are Bt1,274 for Standard Room, Bt1,614 for Superior and Bt1,869 for Deluxe. The package includes a 50-per-cent discount on selected treatments at The Spa, tea and coffee-making facilities, complimentary use of gym facilities and free Wi-Fi in public areas and in the room. Call (02) 254 0444 extension 1220-4 or e-mail: rsvmbkk@amtel.co.th. Best of both worlds Spa InterContinental Bangkok presents a new two-hour treatment combining a one-hour Primmalai Thai Body massage with a 60-minute Kerstin Florian Caviar Facial to relieve tension and rejuvenate the skin. The East Meets West package, priced at Bt7,500, has been designed so that guests reap the benefits of two distinct therapeutic traditions. The offer is available from now until August31. Call (02) 656 0444 extension 6288 or visit www.Bangkok.Intercontinental.com. RAYONG Three into two does go Rayong Marriott Resort & Spa is offering a Rayong Getaway package that allows three persons to stay for the price of two for a minimum two-night stay. Benefits include breakfast for three persons, no extra charges for the third guest and a complimentary upgrade to the next room type. Rates range from Bt3,000 to Bt4,500 and are valid from Sunday to Friday but not Saturday. The deal is good until September30. Book online at www.MarriottRayongResort.com or call (038) 998 000. PHUKET Breaks with a Glow Discover the relaxing and natural side of Phuket at Glow Elixir Koh Yao Yai with its Holiday Dreamers Advance Purchase promotion. Book 14 days in advance and receive a 25-per-cent discount off the best available rate for a Superior Villa, and a 20-per-cent discount off the best available rate for a Deluxe Villa or BeachFront Pool Villa. Rates are inclusive of breakfast for 2 persons and start at Bt3,375 per night. Book 30 days in advance and receive a 25 to 30-per-cent discount with prices starting at Bt3,150 per night. The offer is good until October 31. Call (087) 808 3838 |or e-mail: rsvn.kohyaoyai@glowbyzinc.com. And mother came too Share some magical moments with your beloved mum on Mother's Day at Eastin Yama Hotel Phuket. At Bt999 per room per night, you and your mum can enjoy a stay in a Superior Room including breakfast for two. Take your mum as part of a group and you can book up to 5 rooms for the same price of Bt999. Book now for stays from August 1 to 31. Call (076) 330 777 or |e-mail: rsvn@eastinyama phuket .com. Visit www.EastinYamaPhuket.com. 122 Viewed
